thread.title: New Gold Coast casino site announced
thread.title_full: New Gold Coast casino site announced

title: New Gold Coast casino site announced
text:
Tue, Aug 4, 2015, 10:56 AM AEST - Australia Markets close in 5 hrs 4 mins New Gold Coast casino site announced AAP – 28 minutes ago Print 
A new site has been announced for an integrated resort and casino on the Gold Coast after Queensland's new Labor Government earlier this year knocked back plans for a cruise ship terminal as part of the development. 
Chinese developer ASF Consortium had planned to build on Wavebreak Island and include a cruise ship terminal, but State Development Minister Anthony Lynham on Tuesday announced the new site would be a five hectare block near Sea World. 
"I know that the Gold Coast has been waiting on this news, but its been important to get this right," Dr Lynham said. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook AAP 
Federal Labor has condemned a proposal for a two-tiered penalty rate system. A Productivity Commission draft report, … Terms
